column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I love the aesthetic of the restaurant
column2: and service so far has been good (I've been here twice). We waited a bit for a table on a Saturday for lunch
column4: the server waited on us promptly and we didn't wait long for the food to come out. The ramen is also amazing and very flavorful. There is a vegan option
column5: and the broth is so good you can also add meat to the vegan broth. Minus 1 star only because I got the new shrimp ramen and it wasn't good. Why roll shrimp in tempura when it's just going to get soggy in soup?
